document.full_text: officials in belarus said they had won a $3 billion loan from a russian-backed fund, but russia's finance minister said no such decision by the eurasian economic community had been made.
document.title: europe: belarus: a $3 billion bailout? not so fast, says russia
lines_and_colors: officials in belarus said they had won a $3 billion loan from a russian-backed fund, but russia's finance minister said no such decision by the eurasian economic community had been made.
